title: Software Engineer (AI/ML)
tasks: Acted as Lead AI SME with rapid-prototyping team, informing leadership of quality of AI technology/vendors.

title: AI/ML Intern

Evaluated the model's performance using appropriate metrics and testing methodologies.
Ensured models are integrated into the organization's infrastructure and systems.
